SEARCH
Module biblioteka
Package biblioteka.gui

Class PersistenceManager

java.lang.Object
biblioteka.gui.PersistenceManager
public class PersistenceManager extends Object
Handles the persistence of application data (books, borrowed books, and users) to and from a file using Java Serialization. This class encapsulates the logic for saving the current state of ObservableLists by first converting them to ArrayLists within a PersistenceManager.DataContainer and then serializing this container. Load operations deserialize the container and populate the target ObservableLists. All file operations are performed on a separate thread to avoid blocking the JavaFX Application Thread, and UI updates (like dialogs or callbacks) are posted back to the FX thread.
See Also:
